title: The store ate my rp
body:
So i just purchased $50 in rp and got online. Spending time! However, when i began buying i notice i lost more than i should of, i check my history to find that I've been charged twice for one skin

[Photo](http://briandb99.tumblr.com/post/149526708529/i-was-gonna-buy-some-stuff-and-i-got-charged-twice)

replies.body: We'd like to help you out with this!  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us and our billing team can dig into your specific issue individually.  We'll reply as soon as possible!
